hero.title: Wholesome snacks used to taste like this.
hero.description: Handcrafted energy balls made from dates, nuts, and love. No artificial nonsense. Just real food that makes you feel good.

products.title: Simple. Real. Delicious.
products.subtitle: Four distinct flavors, one simple philosophy: real food tastes better.

classic.name: Classic
classic.shortDescription: Sweet dates, crunchy almonds, and tropical coconut.
classic.description: Our signature date ball that started it all. A harmonious blend of sweet dates, crunchy almonds, and tropical coconut. Pure, simple, and absolutely delicious.

lux.name: Lux
lux.shortDescription: A brownie-like experience without the guilt. Rich, dark, and luxurious.
lux.description: For the chocolate lovers. Premium dates blended with almond, walnuts, and rich cocoa powder, studded with 65% dark chocolate chips. Decadent, yet wholesome.

zen.name: Zen
zen.shortDescription: Vibrant green tea energy for focused calm and clarity.
zen.description: Find your moment of peace with this unique blend. Earthy matcha green tea powder harmonizes with pistachios, dates, and cashews, finished with a touch of coconut. A mindful treat.

zesty.name: Zesty
zesty.shortDescription: A bright burst of sunshine with fresh lemon and sweet raisins.
zesty.description: A vibrant twist on our classic recipe. Sweet dates and creamy cashews meet tangy lemon and raisins, all wrapped in delicate coconut. A burst of sunshine in every bite.

mission.title: Food that fuels your soul.
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is simple: to create snacks that are as honest as they are delicious.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that nature provides everything we need to feel energized and vibrant, without unpronouncable ingredients and hidden syrups. That's why our energy balls are made from just a handful of raw, whole, recognizable ingredients.
mission.paragraph3: Every bite is our promise of quality, sustainability, and pure, simple flavor.
mission.quote: "We don't just sell snacks; we advocate for a return to real, whole food."

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A passion for wholesome, delicious snacks made with love and real, simple ingredients.
about.originP1: Better Bites started in a small kitchen with a simple frustration: why are most "healthy" snacks filled with ingredients we can't pronounce?
about.originP2: We were tired of reading labels packed with artificial sweeteners, preservatives, and mystery additives. We craved something real — a snack that was as honest as it was delicious.
about.originP3: So we started experimenting. Dates became our natural sweetener. Almonds, cashews, and walnuts added crunch and nutrition. Coconut, cacao, and matcha brought flavor and variety. No cooking required — just pure, raw ingredients blended together with care.
about.missionText: To create clean, wholesome, and real snacks that make you feel good. We're here to prove that healthy eating doesn't mean sacrificing taste — and that transparency in ingredients should be the norm, not the exception.
about.visionText: A world where everyone has access to snacks that fuel their day without compromise. We envision a future where reading ingredient labels brings joy, not confusion — and where "healthy" simply means "real."
about.whySubtitle: Every bite we create is guided by these core beliefs.
about.realIngredientsDesc: If you can't recognize it, we don't use it. Simple as that.
about.madeWithLoveDesc: Every batch is handcrafted with attention and care.
about.communityFirstDesc: We're building more than a brand — we're building a movement.
